languages.text: Там, где прежде золотились бескрайние леса, теперь лишь выжженная земля в редких сполохах догорающих деревьев. Пламя, стершее скверну с лика планеты, унесло и ее прежнее очарование. Такова цена очищения.

traits.locale_text: Там, где прежде золотились бескрайние леса, теперь лишь выжженная земля в редких сполохах догорающих деревьев. Пламя, стершее скверну с лика планеты, унесло и ее прежнее очарование. Такова цена очищения.

languages.text: Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees remain. The flames that erased this filth from the face of the planet also stripped it of its former charm. This is the price of purification.
languages.original_text: Там, где прежде золотились бескрайние леса, теперь лишь выжженная земля в редких сполохах догорающих деревьев. Пламя, стершее скверну с лика планеты, унесло и ее прежнее очарование. Такова цена очищения.

traits.locale_text: Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now is only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees. The flame that erased the filth from the face of the planet also took away its former charm. This is the price of purification.

Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now is only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees. The flame that erased the filth from the face of the planet also took away its former charm. This is the price of purification.

Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees remain. The flames that erased this filth from the face of the planet also stripped it of its former charm. This is the price of purification.

Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees remain. The flames that erased this filth from the face of the planet also stripped it of its former charm. This is the price of purification.

Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees remain. The flames that erased this filth from the face of the planet also stripped it of its former charm. This is the price of purification.

languages.text: 这颗行星原本长满了一望无际的金色森林，如今只剩下焦土与树木燃烧时的隐约火光。净化的烈焰将一切污秽从行星表面抹除，但也让这颗行星失去了昔日的魅力。这便是净化的代价。
languages.original_text: Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees remain. The flames that erased this filth from the face of the planet also stripped it of its former charm. This is the price of purification.

traits.locale_text: 这颗行星原本长满了一望无际的金色森林，如今只剩下焦土与树木燃烧时的隐约火光。净化的烈焰将一切污秽从行星表面抹除，但也让这颗行星失去了昔日的魅力。这便是净化的代价。

languages.text: かつては、どこまでも続く黄金の森が輝いていたのに、いまや焼け焦げた大地と、まれに燃える木々の閃光だけが残っている。汚れた者を惑星上から消し去った炎は、かつての魅力もまた奪い去ってしまった。これが浄めの代償なのだ。
languages.original_text: Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees remain. The flames that erased this filth from the face of the planet also stripped it of its former charm. This is the price of purification.

traits.locale_text: かつては、どこまでも続く黄金の森が輝いていたのに、いまや焼け焦げた大地と、まれに燃える木々の閃光だけが残っている。汚れた者を惑星上から消し去った炎は、かつての魅力もまた奪い去ってしまった。これが浄めの代償なのだ。

languages.text: Donde antes brillaban interminables bosques dorados, ahora solo queda tierra quemada y los extraños destellos de árboles ardiendo. Las llamas que borraron esta inmundicia de la faz del planeta también lo despojaron de su antiguo encanto. Este es el precio de la purificación.
languages.original_text: Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees remain. The flames that erased this filth from the face of the planet also stripped it of its former charm. This is the price of purification.

traits.locale_text: Donde antes brillaban interminables bosques dorados, ahora solo queda tierra quemada y los extraños destellos de árboles {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiendo{/g}. Las llamas que borraron esta inmundicia de la faz del planeta también lo despojaron de su antiguo encanto. Este es el precio de la purificación.

languages.text: Wo einst endlose goldene Wälder leuchteten, bleiben nur noch verbrannte Erde und hie und da das Leuchten eines brennenden Baums. Die Flammen, die dieses Gift vom Angesicht des Planeten ausgelöscht haben, haben ihm auch seinen einstigen Charme geraubt. Das ist der Preis der Läuterung.
languages.original_text: Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees remain. The flames that erased this filth from the face of the planet also stripped it of its former charm. This is the price of purification.

traits.locale_text: Wo einst endlose goldene Wälder leuchteten, bleiben nur noch verbrannte Erde und hie und da das Leuchten eines brennenden Baums. Die Flammen, die dieses Gift vom Angesicht des Planeten ausgelöscht haben, haben ihm auch seinen einstigen Charme geraubt. Das ist der Preis der Läuterung.

languages.text: Les vastes forêts mordorées ont cédé la place à une terre brûlée parsemée de lueurs émises par les quelques arbres qui n'ont pas encore fini de flamber. Les flammes qui ont nettoyé la surface de la planète l'ont par la même occasion privée de ce qui faisait son charme. Tel le prix de la purification.
languages.original_text: Where endless golden forests used to glimmer, now only scorched earth and the rare flashes of burning trees remain. The flames that erased this filth from the face of the planet also stripped it of its former charm. This is the price of purification.

traits.locale_text: Les vastes forêts mordorées ont cédé la place à une terre brûlée parsemée de lueurs émises par les quelques arbres qui n'ont pas encore fini de flamber. Les flammes qui ont nettoyé la surface de la planète l'ont par la même occasion privée de ce qui faisait son charme. Tel le prix de la purification.
